text: The 1907 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1907 college football season. The head coach was Arthur McKean coaching the team in his first year. The team finished the season with a final record of 4–5–2. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1907 Geneva Covenanters football team
